headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About Texas Instruments (TXN) Stock?
summary: Back in 2024, on May 14, Mad Money’s Jim Cramer discussed the U.S. government doubling tariffs on so-called “legacy semiconductors” — older-generation chips where the U.S. had become reliant on foreign supply. He pointed to Texas Instruments Incorporated (NASDAQ:TXN) as the clearest American winner from that policy at the time, saying: “The government’s doubling the […]
